code: import{GET_PRODUCTS_REQUEST,GET_PRODUCTS_SUCCESS,GET_PRODUCTS_FAILED}from"./constants";export var getProducts=function getProducts(){return{type:GET_PRODUCTS_REQUEST};};export var getProductsSuccess=function getProductsSuccess(data){return{type:GET_PRODUCTS_SUCCESS,data:data};};export var getProductsFailed=function getProductsFailed(data){return{type:GET_PRODUCTS_FAILED,data:data};};
